name: Samurai Revenge 2
description:
Samurai Revenge is back and get ready for the ultimate samurai experience with Samurai Revenge 2! This intense old-school platformer mixed with RPG elements brings back the famous samurai Kabuto, who is determined to defend his village and his country from enemies.

Samurai Revenge 2 features thrilling moments and unexpected challenges. Maneuver through traps and defeat enemies who try to stop you on your journey. With many levels of emotions from anxiety to joy, you'll have a great experience playing this game.

Explore the beauty of three different worlds with high-quality graphics and upgrade your character's skills to take on tougher battles. Samurai Revenge 2 combines action, hack-n-slash, RPG, and puzzle adventure elements to create a unique gaming experience.

Become a master samurai by overcoming the challenges in Samurai Revenge 2. Download the game now and join Kabuto on his quest to save his village and country!
